message: I dash out of the store, scattering customers. I emerge just in time to see the little blue furball vanish down an alley ahead of me.
I hurry after him, but he's too fast. I can barely keep up.
Why is he running? Did I upset him?
Certainly, Allmates can seem human, but that's ultimately just programming.
Take Beni, for example―Koujaku programmed him to be short-tempered. Ren, on the other hand, is programmed to be patient.
Their behavior may vary slightly within set parameters, but an Allmate doing a sudden emotional one-eighty is pretty much unheard of.
But Ren was damaged earlier, so...
I turn yet another corner, and there―
